core.metrics¶

Provides standard metric evaluations for dialog.

Uses locking and shared memory when numthreads is set to >1 to share metrics between processes.

parlai.core.metrics.normalize_answer(s)¶

Lower text and remove punctuation, articles and extra whitespace.

parlai.core.metrics.aggregate_task_reports(reports, tasks, micro=False)¶

Aggregate separate task reports into a single report.

Parameters

  • reports – list of report dicts from separate tasks

  • tasks – list of tasks

  • micro – average per example if True, else average over t

Returns

aggregated report dicts

parlai.core.metrics.aggregate_metrics(reporters)¶

Aggregate metrics from multiple reports.
